issue.title: copy_file(from, to, ...) has a number of unspecified error conditions

discussion.p: There are a number of error cases that copy_file(from, to, ...) does not take into account. Specifically the cases where:

ol.li: from is not a regular file
to exists and is not a regular file

discussion.p: These error cases should be specified as such.
Wed AM: Move to Tentatively Ready

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4582.

blockquote.p:
-3- Requires: At most one constant from each copy_options option group (27.10.10.2) is present in options.
